Posts.Content: Dec 21, 2012 11:02AM Lou746 wrote: Hi ladies. I am in a support group and one of our members is into her 22nd year of breast cancer. She is about to start chemo again - her cancer progress cycle seems to rear it's head ever 7 years roughly. But, she is still going. I hope that will be me as I am at the beginning of the journey.
Posts.Title: What do you make of the miracle stories? Skream DivineMrsM
